hero.title: Sulaiman AlRajhi University Interactive Platform
hero.description: Your unified gateway to access all electronic services easily and securely. We serve students, staff, and visitors with high efficiency and professionalism

services.title: Electronic Services
services.subtitle: Choose the service that suits you and get started easily
services.inquiryDesc: Get answers to all your questions
services.complaintSuggestionDesc: Share your feedback and ideas with us

features.title: Why Our Platform?
features.subtitle: We provide you with a distinguished and comfortable experience with the highest security and quality standards
features.securityDesc: Advanced data protection with secure Nafath login
features.fastResponseDesc: Instant processing of your requests with real-time notifications
features.supportDesc: Professional support team ready to assist you

userTypes.title: Who We Serve
userTypes.subtitle: A comprehensive platform serving all members of the university community

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform
faq.q1: How do I submit an inquiry?
faq.a1: Simply log in through Nafath, navigate to the Inquiry section, fill out the form with your question details, and submit. You'll receive a response within 24-48 hours.
faq.q2: Can I track my submitted requests?
faq.a2: Yes! After logging in, go to 'Track Requests' to view all your submissions, their current status, and any responses from our team.
faq.q3: How do I book an appointment with university leadership?
faq.a3: Navigate to 'Book Appointment', select the leadership member you wish to meet, choose an available time slot, and confirm your booking.
faq.a4: Absolutely. We use Nafath authentication and implement advanced security measures to protect all your personal data and communications.
faq.q5: What if I need urgent assistance?
faq.a5: For urgent matters, you can submit a high-priority inquiry or contact our support team directly through the provided contact information.

cta.title: Ready to Use Our Services?
cta.description: Log in via National Nafath and start using all electronic services securely and easily

footer.description: Sulaiman AlRajhi University Interactive Platform - Your unified gateway for all electronic services
